name.value: FHIR Connectathon 19 - Terminology Services - Lookup - SNOMED - OK - GET - Simple - JSON

description.value: CodeSystem $lookup simple tests against known SNOMED codes where the expected outcome is a successful response with valid name and display value. All $lookup operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP GET method.

Lookup test for SNOMED system and code using HTTP GET; 6064005 (Topical route). Expected response is 200 (OK) with a Parameters payload containing the name of the terminology and correct display value.
CodeSystem $lookup operation for SNOMED system and code for Topical route.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Parameters.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter name with valueString containing SNOMED.
Confirm that the returned Parameters resource contains the expected parameter display set to any of the Preferred or Acceptable SNOMED display strings.

expression.value: Parameters.parameter.where(name = 'display').value.where($this = 'Topical route (qualifier value)' or $this = 'Topical route' or $this = 'Topical use')
